take the necessary measures to limit the processing of personal data concerning criminal records to the strict minimum. Such processing applies only if it is duly justified based on the function at stake. In addition, only staff members who are bound by appropriate confidentiality obligations have access to such data.  \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Where the processing of your personal data is based on your consent, you have a right to withdraw such consent at any time. However, this will not affect the lawfulness of processing based on your consent before its withdrawal.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The basis for you providing personal data and sensitive personal information partly comes from a statutory requirement, partly from a contractual requirement under your employment contract, and partly from a need for the information to carry out the employment relationship with you. In general, you must provide the personal information and sensitive personal information as may be the case, except when we indicate that certain information is voluntary (e.g., in connection with employee satisfaction surveys). Not providing your personal information and sensitive personal information may prevent EPAM from carrying out the employment relationship with you. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
